tool_description: Shows recent news articles in the cryptocurrency market. Find article by keyword search to find related news or return general information about crypto market.
name: Crypto News_v2
title: Crypto News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get news about crypto from a specific news source. There are 18 news sources to choose from cryptonews, coindesk, crypto.news, yahoo, fxstreet, cointelegraph, businessinsider, cryptopotato, ambcrypto, cryptonewsline, cryptoglobe, coingecko, cryptoslate, bitcoinist, forbes, nulltx, blockonomi, and coinspeaker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/news/cryptonews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: General search
api_list.description: Can take a single word search that will return any articles with the given keyword.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/{searchid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific Article Keyword Search
api_list.description: Takes a title and keyword that will then return any articles from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/news/cryptonews/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}/{searchid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Crypto News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news with crypto and bitcoin from many different websites across the internet.
